channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: デジタルメディア測定・分析用ソフトウェアを提供するダブルベリファイが、デジタル広告キャンペーン最適化企業のサイビッズを1億2500万ドルで買収することで合意（Ray Schultz/MediaPost）
item.description:
Ray Schultz / MediaPost:
DoubleVerify, which offers software for digital media measurement and analytics, agrees to acquire digital ad campaign optimization company Scibids for $125M  —  DoubleVerify is acquiring Scibids, a digital campaign optimization firm.  —  The cash-and-stock transaction is valued at $125 million …

item.title: BBCがsocial.bbcを立ち上げ、BBCの一握りのアカウントからの投稿がある「実験的な」マストドン・サーバーで、6カ月間このサーバーを試すとしている（Emma Roth/The Verge）。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
The BBC launches social.bbc, an “experimental” Mastodon server with posts from a handful of BBC accounts, and says it will try out the server for six months  —  The BBC has launched its own “experimental” Mastodon server, marking one of the first major news outlets to establish an instance on the Twitter alternative.

item.title: 情報筋トランプ大統領は、訴訟弁護の一環として、タッカー・カールソンが元米国議会警察署長に行った未放送インタビューをFox Newsに召喚したが、Fox Newsは拒否（Eriq Gardner/Puck）
item.description:
Eriq Gardner / Puck:
Sources: Trump subpoenaed Fox News for Tucker Carlson's unaired interview with a former US Capitol Police chief, as part of a lawsuit defense; Fox News refused  —  The former president is demanding the network turn over footage and communications that he could use to defend himself …

item.title: あるデジタルアーティストがStable Diffusionのトレーニングセットから離脱した後、コミュニティは彼のスタイルを模倣したモデルを作り、オープンソースのモデルに関する問題を提起した（Jose Antonio Lanz/Decrypt）
item.description:
Jose Antonio Lanz / Decrypt:
After a digital artist opted out of the Stable Diffusion training set, the community made a model copying his style, raising questions around open-source models  —  More popular than Picasso and Leonardo Da Vinci among AI artists, Greg Rutkowski opted out of the Stable Diffusion training set.

item.title: Ampere分析：Netflix、Disneyなどの広告ティアが米国で合計1億ユーザーを突破、Hulu加入者の90％以上が広告ティア（Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap）
item.description:
Lucas Manfredi / The Wrap:
Ampere Analysis: ad tiers from Netflix, Disney, and others have collectively crossed 100M users in the US; 90%+ of Hulu subscribers are on its ad-supported tier  —  Ad-supported streaming tiers from Netflix, Disney and others have collectively surpassed 100 million users in the United States …

item.title: アマゾンは9月1日から、Fire TV上のストリーミング・サービスに対し、広告インプレッションの30%をアマゾンに提供するか、特定の国では広告収入の30%を共有することを義務づける（Matthew Keys/Fierce Wireless）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / Fierce Wireless:
Amazon will require streaming services on Fire TV to give 30% of their ad impressions to Amazon, or in certain countries share 30% of ad revenue, from Sept. 1  —  Amazon will soon require international app developers who offer ad-supported streaming video services available to Fire TV users …

item.title: ワーナー・ブラザース・ディスカバリー、広告営業部門を再編・再構築し、特定の持株会社に専任役員を配置（Alex Weprin/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / Hollywood Reporter:
Warner Bros. Discovery reorganizes and restructures its advertising sales division, with dedicated executives for specific holding companies  —  WBD is reorganizing its ad sales leadership with executives dedicated to specific holding companies. … On Monday, the company unveiled its new structure …

item.title: コンテンツ・ライセンシング組織NLAメディアアクセスによると、2023年までに全世界で約70万件の盗用ニュース記事の削除に貢献し、2022年の3万件から増加した（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Content licensing organization NLA Media Access says it helped get around 700,000 stolen news articles removed in 2023 so far globally, up from 30K in 2022  —  Content farmers appear to be “getting a bit more brazen”.  —  Copyright theft affecting news publishers in the UK and around the world is …

item.title: Twitter/XがCenter for Countering Digital Hateを提訴すると脅迫、NPOがTwitterとその広告ビジネスを傷つけるために「厄介で根拠のない主張」を行ったと主張（New York Times）
item.description:
New York Times:
Twitter/X threatens to sue Center for Countering Digital Hate, alleging the nonprofit made “troubling and baseless claims” to hurt Twitter and its ad business  —  The Center for Countering Digital Hate said it had received a letter from X, Twitter's parent company …

item.title: 情報筋Disneyは、ボブ・アイガー氏がCEOに就任した際に後継者候補と目された2人の元幹部、ケビン・メイヤー氏とトム・スタッグス氏をアイガー氏のアドバイザーとして雇用（Christopher Grimes/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Christopher Grimes / Financial Times:
Sources: Disney hired Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs, two ex-executives seen as potential successors to Bob Iger during his first stint as CEO, as advisers to Iger  —  Disney has hired two former executives who were seen as potential successors to Bob Iger during his first stint as the company's chief executive …

item.title: 米大統領選のキャンペーンは、前例のない断片化されたニューメディアの中で展開され、有権者や政治オブザーバーを混乱させている（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
The campaign for the US presidency is playing out across an unprecedented, fragmented new media landscape, confusing voters and political observers alike  —  The News  —  Did you catch Ron DeSantis's interview with Shawn Ryan?  How about Tim Scott's latest hit on Faithwire, or Joe Biden's chat with Will Arnett and Jason Bateman?

item.title: Media 2070のディレクター、コレット・ワトソンとのQ&A：立ち上げから3年後の文化状況の変化、メディア賠償の提唱などについて（Feven Merid/Columbia Journalism Review）
item.description:
Feven Merid / Columbia Journalism Review:
Q&A with Media 2070's director Collette Watson on shifting cultural conditions three years after its launch, advocating for media reparations, and more  —  In 2020, a group of Black staffers at Free Press—a nonprofit that advocates for diverse, independent media ownership and equitable access …

item.title: SAG-AFTRAは、インディーズプロダクションを続行させる「暫定合意」方式を擁護、一部の俳優が合意はストライキを長引かせると反発（Adam Chitwood/The Wrap）
item.description:
Adam Chitwood / The Wrap:
SAG-AFTRA defends its “interim agreement” approach that lets indie productions proceed, as some actors push back, saying the agreement would prolong the strike  —  The letter to members comes as actors like Sarah Silverman have spoken out against working during the strike

item.title: ハリウッド・ストライキの調停役候補：本命とされるカリフォルニア州知事ギャビン・ニューサム、LA市長カレン・バス、セカンド・ジェントルマンのダグ・エムホフ（Deadline)
item.description:
Deadline:
A look at potential mediators in the Hollywood strikes: CA Gov. Gavin Newsom, considered the main choice, LA Mayor Karen Bass, and Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff  —  Names that have been floated as potential mediators include Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass and even Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff …

item.title: 調査：Spotifyのわずか2％の「スーパーリスナー」が、アーティストの月間ストリーミング全体の平均18％を牽引し、大物アーティストになるとその数は30％に上る（Murray Stassen/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Murray Stassen / Music Business Worldwide:
Study: just 2% of Spotify “super listeners” drive an average of 18% of all monthly streams for an artist, with the number rising to 30% for the biggest artists  —  MBW's Stat Of The Week is a series in which we highlight a data point that deserves the attention of the global music industry.
